title: Jhaoo Chowdhari: a Tongawallah from Delhi
creator_credit: Yavar Abbas and Gateway Film Productions
brief_description: Faces of India series. Shows intimate details of family life of a Delhi tradesman and of the district around his home. We see his wives and daughters occupied in housework and in caring for the all important horses, which pull the tonga which is Jhaoo’s livelihood. Also shows sacred shrines never before filmed. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
